item.description:
June 18 , 2009- Monthly Meeting
Jillian Sidoti, SEC Attorney and Charlie Dobens, Multi-Family Investor


What's all the buzz about real estate investing?

Ever wished you were a fly on the wall in the office of a real estate investor?

Charlie Dobens and his team invest in large multi-family complexes in "emerging markets". You keep hearing about emerging markets everywhere you turn, but do you really know what that means to you, and how it's done? Well, he doesn't do it by himself, that's for sure. Join Charlie and SEC Attorney Jillian Sidoti and they delve into the nitty gritty of pulling together a deal for 125 units in Lexington, KY.


Things you'll learn:

* What are the most important deal points to look for?

* Whatâ€™s the best corporate structure for you and your team?

* How should title be held?

* How do you get investors to fund your project?

* How do you legally protect yourself when selling securities?


You'll watch the actual process as they put together the mechanics of large deals with multiple investors. They'll explain the pitfalls and perils if you don't do it right, and give you the insight to decide if this is for you.


5:30 - 6:15 PM - POWER HOUR - For Members Only
6:30 PM - Meeting
Location: Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA
Free to members, Visitors only $25 at the door.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association June Meetup
